title: "no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued" when building combine-4.6.6 on nightly bd39bbb4b

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code The ICE occurs in PR https://github.com/cargo-bins/cargo-binstall/pull/773 when building crate combine-4.6.6 and herre is [the link to the CI](https://github.com/cargo-bins/cargo-binstall/actions/runs/4119780542/jobs/7113828767). ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu installed - rustc 1.69.0-nightly (bd39bbb4b 2023-02-07) ``` ### Error output

``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in Item(WithOptConstParam { did: DefId(0:3469 ~ combine[5d09]::stream::{impl#47}::reset), const_param_did: None }) (after phase change to runtime-optimized) at bb0[4]: encountered `Assign((_0, const Result::<(), StringStreamError>::Ok(())))` with incompatible types: left-hand side has type: Result<(), <&str as StreamOnce>::Error> right-hand side has type: Result<(), StringStreamError> --> /tmp/tmp.wMIbkQMrxT/registry/src/index.crates.io-6f17d22bba15001f/combine-4.6.6/src/stream/mod.rs:44:17 | 44 | Ok(()) | ^^^^^^ ... 153 | clone_resetable! {('a) &'a str} | ------------------------------- in this macro invocation | = note: delayed at 0: ::emit_diagnostic 1: ::delay_span_bug:: 2: ::fail:: 3: ::run_pass 4: rustc_mir_transform::optimized_mir 5: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 6: ::encode_crate_root 7: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata_impl 8: rustc_data_structures::sync::join:: 9: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 10: rustc_metadata::fs::encode_and_write_metadata 11: rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen 12: ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 13: ::ongoing_codegen 14: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 15: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> 16: >::set::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 17: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 18: <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 19: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/bd39bbb4bb92df439bf6d85470e296cc6a47ffbd/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1988:9 20: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/bd39bbb4bb92df439bf6d85470e296cc6a47ffbd/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1988:9 21: std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start at /rustc/bd39bbb4bb92df439bf6d85470e296cc6a47ffbd/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 22: 23: = note: this error: internal compiler error originates in the macro `clone_resetable` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (bd39bbb4b 2023-02-07) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C opt-level=z -C panic=abort -C linker-plugin-lto -C codegen-units=1 -C strip=symbols note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `combine` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
